version_description:
The Fold:
Ever backed a sure thing only to find out during the race that it’s a dud?
Introducing The Fold!
Bail out of your racing bet, during the race!
You read that right. Your full stake back, in cash, if you want to Fold your bet during the race
Find it on selected races on the racecard!
Giddy up!

BlackBook:
A revamped BlackBook home where you can see all races your runners are entered in and place a bet.

Forgot your username or password?
Don’t worry, we’ve developed a new quick and easy way to retrieve your login details via the app.

The easiest betting app just got easier! The same great Sportsbet app is now faster to use and packed with some great new features!

Same Race Multi: Now you can bet on horses to finish anywhere in the Top 4, and combine them in the one bet, to get bigger odds!

Best Bets Expert Tips Home: Want some help picking a winner? Now you can find all the Best & Value bets of the day in one destination, compare tipsters, and bet direct from there. Too easy!

Market Movers: It's easy to follow the money with Sportsbet's Market Movers - sort the racecard by the biggest movers and see which horses are hot before the jump.

Apple Pay: Adding funds to your account has never been easier. No need to painfully punch in those card details, just link your account with your Apple Pay credentials and you're good to go.

Hotshot Jackpot NBA

Play for free to win a share of $5,000 each Thursday simply by picking the winning team and margin in 5 NBA matches

Hotshot Racing
The all new free-to-play racing game. Pick the last 6 winners at Moonee Valley on a Friday night to win a share of the $50,000 prize (or more)!

**Trill of regal bugles** No new features this update – just performance updates and bug fixes.

…Should save the regal bugles for new features shouldn’t we? Noted.

Hotshot Jackpot NRL
Select the first try scorer in 5 NRL matches to win a share of $100k. Free to play!

Dear Valued App Downloader,

Good afternoon/evening/morning/night.

We regret to inform you that the app update included herein contains scant new features of major note.

It is however overflowing with performance updates and speed upgrades.

All our most convivial regards,

SB

Dear Valued App Downloader,

Good afternoon/evening/morning/night.

We regret to inform you that the app update included herein contains scant new features of major note.

It is however overflowing with performance updates and speed upgrades.

All our most convivial regards,

SB

Same Game Multi

Now on Soccer. Place a multi within the same game, it’s a bet within a bet!

G’day punters
This update is just bug fixes and performance upgrades.
It’s not exciting, we know that.
But imagine commanding an army of mercenary bears in a military coup on an alien planet, that would be exciting hey.
So when you’re feeling disappointed about the lack of new features, just think about that instead.
Cheers,
SB
Just bug fixes this update, but don’t worry, we’ve banned our developers from Twitch until they make some cool new stuff, so hang tight.

POLi deposits now available in app.

A fast and secure alternative deposit method that links you directly to your bank accounts.

Just bug fixes this update. We know that maybe disappointing so here’s a joke.



Why can you only ever ran on a camp site, not run? Because it’s always past tents… It’s a grammar joke. We should tell a joke to make up for that joke shouldn’t we?

Sportsbet is the best place to bet (say that, six times quick) on soccer, with our awesome promos and legions of live markets!

Get on a Same Game Multi, invent your own bets with BYOBets, and get more game stats and insights than you can shake a stick at. ANYWAY, download us!

Sportsbet is the best place to bet (say that, six times quick) on soccer, with our awesome promos and legions of live markets!
Get on a Same Game Multi, invent your own bets with BYOBets, and get more game stats and insights than you can shake a stick at. ANYWAY, download us!

Same Game Multi is even better! Now you can combine as many tryscorers, disposal getters or goal scorers in your Same Game Multi as you like!
We’ve also beefed up our International Racing offering with premium form, tips and comments provided by our partners at Racing and Sports. Available on Thoroughbred races across UK, Ireland, South Africa, Hong Kong, Singapore and France.

In 18.19.2:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

In 18.19.1:
The NEW and IMPROVED racecard lets you view Best Bets Tips, Flucs & Key Stats easier. Simon Marshall reckons it’s now easier to find a winner, so we’ve given it the all clear.
Also, our numbers guy, Bazza, told us you like Same Game Multis so much, that we should allow Same Game Multis to be multi’d into other Same Game Multis into normal Multis. Baz is a nice guy (and a big fan of multis), so we built that to make him (and you) happy.

In 18.19.3:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

In 18.19:
The NEW and IMPROVED racecard lets you view Best Bets Tips, Flucs & Key Stats easier. Simon Marshall reckons it's now easier to find a winner, so we've given it the all clear.
Also, our numbers guy, Bazza, told us you like Same Game Multis so much, that we should allow Same Game Multis to be multi'd into other Same Game Multis into normal Multis. Baz is a nice guy (and a big fan of multis), so we built that to make him (and you) happy.

In 19.01:
Bug fixes and performance improvements

In 18.24:
The NEW and IMPROVED racecard lets you view Best Bets Tips, Flucs & Key Stats easier. Simon Marshall reckons it’s now easier to find a winner, so we’ve given it the all clear.

The easiest betting app just got easier! The same great Sportsbet app is now faster to use and allows you to customise your experience with some great new features.

• New homepage: Huge racing fan? Or just nuts about Sport? Can't pick 'em? We’ve switched up our homepage so that whatever you’re in the mood for, you’ve got it all up front – no digging around!

• Find races faster: Personalise your Racing page choosing races and tracks you want to see, by combining Horse, Harness and Greys, both internationally and at home!

• Improved Exotics Placement: They’re about to jump at Flemington and you’ve forgotten to place your Trifecta? Quick Exotics can now be placed in a flash so you never miss the jump.

• Sports Favourites: Big Volleyball punter but sick of having to find it every time? Get quicker access to the Sports you love by tapping the Star on the Sports page.

• Easier to Cash Out: Cashing Out is faster than ever before. Look for all of your Cash Out offers on the pending bets page, so you can Cash Out with ease!

• Bet Live has had a boost. We’re showing you more info up front on the Bet Live page so you can figure out what’s worth having a punt on, quicker.
